title: How to Cook Carbonara Tagliatelle (Pasta)

steps.headline: To start you have to heat up water.
When water is boiling, add pasta to the water and turn the heat up high.
A minute later, put bacon cubes into the stove.
steps.description: Stir them every 30 seconds during 2 minutes.

steps.headline: Calm down fire of the stove and let bacon cube cook.
When bacon cubes are almost done, pour the fresh cream into the stove.
Wait 2 minutes and stop fire below the stove.
Drain the pasta and dish it out.
Arrange one egg yolk per plate.

text: To start you have to heat up water.  When water is boiling, add pasta to the water and turn the heat up high.  A minute later, put bacon cubes into the stove. Stir them every 30 seconds during 2 minutes. Calm down fire of the stove and let bacon cube cook.  When bacon cubes are almost done, pour the fresh cream into the stove.  Wait 2 minutes and stop fire below the stove.  Drain the pasta and dish it out.  Pour the sauce into plates.  Sprinkle parmesan.  Arrange one egg yolk per plate.  Finished.
